name: KirtanAradhna
0:
”Alexa open kirtan aradhna”
”Start kirtan aradhna”
”Open kirtan aradhna and play”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kirtan aradhna
des:
Listen to Kirtan Aradhna for free. It is an Internet Radio 24x7 from everywhere. Bhagwan is with you when you listen to bhajan-kirtan. It is one of the best ways to concentrate, meditation and communicate with Bhagwan. It is a Seva to Bhagwan.

Disclaimer: The skill has some content in Gujarati, Hindi and Sanskrit language.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
